title: How to Make a Banana Margarita

steps.headline: Prepare the margarita glass.
steps.description: Wet the rim of the glass with lemon juice and lightly dip it into caster sugar.

steps.headline: Measure and add all ingredients to a blender.
Blend until the mixture is smooth.
Pour the mixture into the glass.
Garnish the drink with a lemon juice-dipped banana slice.

text: Assemble the ingredients.  Prepare the margarita glass. Wet the rim of the glass with lemon juice and lightly dip it into caster sugar. Measure and add all ingredients to a blender.  Add crushed ice.  Blend until the mixture is smooth.  Pour the mixture into the glass.  Garnish the drink with a lemon juice-dipped banana slice.  Finished.
